Interface HttpParameter

All Known Subinterfaces:
ParsedHttpParameter
public interface HttpParameter
Burp HTTP parameter able to retrieve to hold details about an HTTP request parameter.

    • urlParameter

      static HttpParameter urlParameter(String name, String value)
      Create a new Instance of HttpParameter with HttpParameterType.URL type.
      Parameters:
      name - The parameter name.
      value - The parameter value.
      Returns:
      A new HttpParameter instance.

    • parameter

      static HttpParameter parameter(String name, String value, HttpParameterType type)
      Create a new Instance of HttpParameter with the specified type.
      Parameters:
      name - The parameter name.
      value - The parameter value.
      type - The header type.
      Returns:
      A new HttpParameter instance.
